General.Name: China Three Gorges New Energy Group Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: China Three Gorges Renewables (Group) Co.,Ltd. operates as a renewable energy power generation company. The company generates electricity through wind, solar energy, and hydropower. It also engages in Investment in clean energy, water conservancy, hydropower, electricity, water supply, and dredging, as well as tidal flat reclamation, environmental engineering, planting, breeding, and tourism. In addition, it offers investment consulting and asset trusteeship; manufacture and sales of mechanical equipment and accessories; contracting domestic water conservancy and electric power projects, and international bidding projects; and technical and information consulting services. China Three Gorges Renewables (Group) Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Beijing, China. China Three Gorges Renewables (Group) Co.,Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of China Three Gorges Corporation.
